participant_1.background:
I do my laundry when I run out of clean clothes.
i collect stray people like crazy cat ladys collect cats.
I am not close with my family, but I am close to my friends and the people I volunteer with.
i always seem to be losing things , most recently , my mind.
My parents are my heroes.

participant_2.background:
I don't have a lot of family close by, so I'm close with my friends.
I would rather not talk about my parents.
I love watching sitcoms with my family and cat, Jasper.
I am single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.
running is my way to relax.

content.text: Hey there, it's nice to meet you!
I'm not close to my family either, but I'm close to my friends and the people I volunteer with.
That's great! I'm not close with my parents either, so my friends are my family.
My parents are my heroes. I wish I could be more like them.
I don't really want to talk about my parents.
Okay, I understand. What do you like to do for fun?
I love watching sitcoms with my family and cat, Jasper.
That sounds like fun! I like watching sitcoms too.
I also like running. It's my way to relax.
I like running too! It's a great way to get in shape.
It is! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet you.
